cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Class StoryInfoListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<StoryInfo>
        • cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure.StoryInfoListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class StoryInfoListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<StoryInfo>
    The StoryInfoListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the StoryInfo list. It is in charge of displaying the title and author of each story according to a pre-defined format on the main selection screen.
    Version:
    1.0, 30/10/13
    Author:
    Reginald Miller, Jesse Chu
